title: അതിരമ്പുഴ ജംഗ്ഷൻ ഇനി പഴയ ജംഗ്ഷൻ അല്ല,​ അടിമുടി മാറ്റം
മലയാളത്തിൽ സന്തോഷകരമായ ഓണം ആശംസിച്ച് പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി, ഓണാശംസകൾ നേർന്ന് രാഷ്‌ട്രപതിയും
content: ന്യൂഡൽഹി: കേരളത്തിലെ സഹോദരീ സഹോദരന്മാർക്ക് ഓണാശംസകളുമായി രാഷ്‌ട്രപതി ദ്രൗപതി മുർമു. സമാധാനവും സമൃദ്ധിയും ക്ഷേമവും നിറഞ്ഞ ഓണാശംസകൾ നേർന്ന് പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി നരേന്ദ്ര മോദി. കേരളത്തിലെ സഹോദരീ സഹോദരന്മാർക്ക് ഓണാശംസകൾ നേരുകയാണെന്ന് എക്‌സിൽ കുറിച്ച ആശംസകളിലൂടെ രാഷ്‌ട്രപതി അറിയിച്ചു. പുതിയ വിളവെടുപ്പിന്റെ ഈ ആഘോഷവേളയിൽ പ്രകൃതിയോട് നന്ദി അറിയിക്കുന്നതായി പറഞ്ഞ രാഷ്‌ട്രപതി എല്ലാവർക്കും സമാധാനവും ഐശ്വര്യവും സന്തോഷവും ഉണ്ടാകട്ടെ എന്നും ആശംസിച്ചു. സന്തോഷകരമായ ഓണം ഏവർക്കുമുണ്ടാകട്ടെ എന്ന് മലയാളത്തിലാണ് പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി നരേന്ദ്ര മോദി ആശംസകൾ അറിയിച്ചത്. എങ്ങും സമാധാനവും സമൃദ്ധിയും ക്ഷേമവും ഉണ്ടാകട്ടെ. ലോകമാകെയുള്ള മലയാളിസമൂഹം ഓണം ആവേശത്തോടെ ആഘോഷിക്കുന്നതായും പ്രധാനമന്ത്രി കുറിച്ചു. എല്ലാ മലയാളികൾക്കും ഓണാശംസ നേർന്ന ഗവർണർ ആരിഫ് മുഹമ്മദ് ഖാൻ ഓണത്തിന്റെ മഹിമ ആഘോഷത്തിന്റെ പകിട്ടിലല്ല അത് നൽകുന്ന പ്രത്യാശയുടെ സന്ദേശത്തിലാണ് എന്ന് പറഞ്ഞു. മുൻപെങ്ങോ ഉണ്ടായിരുന്നു എന്ന് കരുതപ്പെടുന്ന വിവേചനരഹിതവും സമത്വസുന്ദരവുമായ കാലത്തിന്റെ ഓർമ്മപ്പെടുത്തലാണ് ഓണം എന്ന് മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി പിണറായി വിജയൻ സന്ദേശത്തിൽ പറഞ്ഞു. വയനാട്ടിലെ ദുരിതബാധിത പ്രദേശങ്ങളുടെ പുനർനി‌ർമ്മാണത്തിൽ പങ്കാളികളായി ഓണാഘോഷങ്ങളെ അർത്ഥവത്താക്കാം എന്നും അദ്ദേഹം അഭിപ്രായപ്പെട്ടു. പൂക്കളം പോലെ ശോഭയാർന്നതും പായസത്തിന്റെ രുചി പോലെ മധുരമുള്ളതുമാകട്ടെ ഓണക്കാലമെന്ന് ഇന്ത്യൻ ഇതിഹാസ ക്രിക്കറ്റ് താരം സച്ചിൻ ടെൻഡുൾക്കറും ആശംസകൾ നേർന്നു.

title: Ailenin davranışları ve beden dili ne anlatıyor?
content: Narin cinayeti soruşturmasında anne, baba, ağabeyleri ve amcanın davranışlarını, beden dilini İstanbul Aydın Üniversitesi Öğretim Üyesi ve İletişim Uzmanı Dr. Hüseyin Kazan Milliyet’e analiz etti. Anne Yüksel Güran: Çarpıcı bir detay var ki o da annenin yüzündeki ifadelerin renk vermeyen nötr biçimde seyretmesidir. Anneyle ilgili durumu özetleyecek olursak iki husus ön plana çıkıyor. Birincisi çok belli etmese de veya edemese de içindeki acı ikincisi ise böyle ağır ve acı süreçteki soğukkanlılığı. Baba Arif Güran: Baba da standartlaşmış bir beden dili göze çarpıyor. Böyle acı verici durumlarda sergilenmesi kolay olmayan sakin bir beden dili sergiliyor. Babanın beden diline makro düzeyde odaklanıldığında genel bir çökkünlük kendini gösteriyor. Amca Salim Güran: Amca cevap verebildiği sorulara cevap verirken söyleyecek bir şeyi olmadığı soruları da nötr bir şekilde geçiştirmektedir. Ağabey Enes Güran: Enes’le ilgi ifadenin tamamı okunduğunda düzenli bir kronolojik akış ve olaya dair boşluk içermeyen bir dizilim bulunmaktadır. Bu dizilim masumiyeti veya soğukkanlılığı sergilemesi açısından üzerinde durulmayı gerektiriyor.

title: 10 maddede LGS’de yeni tercih rehberi
content: LGS’de bir fen bilimleri sorusunun mahkemece iptal edilmesinin ardından puanların yeniden hesaplanması soru işaretlerine yol açtı. Eğitim Uzmanı Salim Ünsal, iptal edilen soruyu boş bırakan veya yanlış işaretleyenlerin avantaj elde ettiğini söyledi. Hürriyet'ten Beyazıt Şenbük hazırladı... Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı (MEB) tarafından 2 Haziran’da düzenlenen ve 1 milyona yakın adayın katıldığı LGS’de sorulan bir fen bilimleri sorusu Ankara 3. İdare Mahkemesi’nce iptal edildi. LGS puanları yeniden hesaplandı ve başka okula geçiş sürecine ilişkin bir takvim oluştu. Geçiş hakkı kazanan öğrenciler okulların yeni taban puanlarına göre 14-20 Eylül tarihleri arasında başvuru yapabilecekler. YANLIŞ YANITLAYAN AVANTAJLI İptal edilen fen bilimleri sorusunu ‘doğru veya yanlış’ cevaplandıranların puanları değişirken, fen bilimleri testinde ‘hiçbir soru cevaplandırmayanların’ ya da ‘soru cevaplandırmasına rağmen hiç neti olmayanların’ puanları değişmedi. Aynı soruyu ‘boş bırakanların ve yanlış cevaplandıranların’ puanı artarken, ‘doğru cevaplandıranların’ puanı düşmüş oldu. Eğitim Uzmanı Salim Ünsal, merak edilen soruları madde madde yanıtladı: 1) KİMLER GEÇİŞ HAKKI KAZANDI: Yeni hesaplanan puanı, genel tercih ve nakil dönemlerindeki tercihlerinde yazılan okulların yeni taban puanlarına eşit ya da daha büyük olanlar. 2) BİRDEN ÇOK OKULA GEÇİŞ HAKKI VAR MI: Evet. Eğer öğrencinin yeni puanı yerleşemediği üst tercihlerinin yeni...

title: DİKKAT! 3 bin liranın üstüne çıkabilir... REKOR ÜSTÜNE REKOR!
content: Altın fiyatları rekor üstüne rekor kırıyor. Peki, FED faiz indirimi beklentisi piyasaya nasıl yansıyor? Beklentiler neler? Detaylar haberimizde. Altın rekor üstüne rekor kırıyor. Gram altın 2800 lira seviyelerine ulaştı. Peki beklentiler ne yönde? Altın ve Para Piyasaları Uzmanı Recep Çolak değerlendirdi; ''Şu anki altının fiyatı 2850 TL, çeyrek altının fiyatı 4650 TL, yarım altının fiyatı 9300 TL, ziynet tam altın dediğimiz 18.500 TL, Cumhuriyet ata altının fiyatı ise 19 bin lira...'' Yeni rekorlar görecek mi? ''Altının yıl sonuna kadar 3 bin ve 3 binin üstünde rakamlara geleceğini öngörüyoruz.'' Yatırımcılar bu noktada nelere dikkat etmeli? ''Altın, yansa da paradır. Dünyanın para birimleri, ülkelerin para birimleri, euro, dolar gibi para birimleri var, sterlin gibi. Bunlar yansa kül olur, ama altın yansa da para olur.''

title: Hieuthuhai thắng áp đảo Quang Anh Rhyder
content: Đêm chung kết chương trình Anh trai say hi tối 14/9, top 16 anh trai bước vào vòng Chung kết 2 với 4 tiết mục đấu nhóm và tìm ra quán quân sau 3 tháng phát sóng. Bốn đội trong vòng Chung kết 2 gồm: Đội Hieuthuhai với các thành viên Song Luân, Jsol, Dương Domic. Đội Atus gồm Rhyder, Isaac, Hurrykng. Đội Đức Phúc gồm Quân A.P, Anh Tú, Captain. Và đội Quang Hùng MasterD gồm Negav, Pháp Kiều, Erik. 4 màn trình diễn nhóm của top 16 anh trai đêm chung kết Anh trai say hi . Bên cạnh 4 tiết mục trình diễn nhóm, sự xuất hiện đặc biệt của DJ, nhà sản xuất âm nhạc Alan Walker trong sân khấu kết hợp cùng top 16 nghệ sĩ cũng gây chú ý. Chương trình gây bất ngờ khi “nhá hàng” format mới dành cho các nghệ sĩ nữ khi mời Pháo, Juky San, Liz Kim Cương, 52Hz, Mỹ Mỹ diễn ca khúc chủ đề Anh trai say hi. Theo lời úp mở của Trấn Thành, show mới Em xinh say hi dự kiến tổ chức vào mùa hè 2025. Sự thành công của Anh trai say hi đến từ những con số biết nói khi phủ sóng mạng xã hội, các bảng xếp hạng âm nhạc. Có thời điểm, 16 ca khúc mới của chương trình cùng lúc có mặt trên Top Trending YouTube Việt Nam hạng mục âm nhạc, chiếm hơn 50% bảng xếp hạng. Đến nay, show đạt hơn 10 tỷ lượt xem trên đa nền tảng, cùng hàng triệu lượt tương tác bình luận....

title: فريدة خميس تتوج بذهبية العالم للخماسي الحديث ومنتخب مصر في المركز الأول
Nhiều khách sạn, nhà hàng miễn phí cho các đoàn đi cứu trợ miền Bắc
content: Hàng trăm nhà hàng, khách sạn , quán ăn và cả các gara sửa chữa xe ô tô tại miền Trung sẵn lòng mời các đoàn cứu trợ đồng bào lũ lụt từ Nam ra Bắc đến nghỉ ngơi, ăn uống, kiểm tra xe miễn phí . Đoàn cứu trợ từ Đà Nẵng được quán Sóng Chiều (TP. Đông Hà, tỉnh Quảng Trị) mời ghé lại ăn cơm trước khi tiếp tục hành trình ra Bắc. Anh Lê Tuấn cho hay những ngày qua đọc tin tức người dân miền Bắc chịu thiệt hại quá nặng nề, anh rất xót xa nhưng chưa thể sắp xếp công việc để ra với bà con. Thấy nhiều đoàn cứu trợ từ Nam ra Bắc nối nhau lên đường mỗi ngày, anh nghĩ mình nên đóng góp bằng cách mời các đoàn dừng lại nhà hàng ăn uống để mọi người nghỉ ngơi, có sức khỏe tiếp tục hành trình. “Nhà hàng đón các đoàn không hạn chế số người, chỉ cần báo trước, chúng tôi sẽ lo cơm nước đầy đủ, không chỉ no mà còn chất lượng, ngon để mọi người có sức. Mấy hôm nay có rất nhiều đoàn dừng lại, như đêm 14/9 đoàn gần 50 người từ TPHCM ra, chủ yếu là thanh niên ra giúp bà con dọn dẹp sau lũ. Có bữa hai đoàn vào cùng lúc, nhân viên tất bật nhưng ai cũng vui vì mình tiếp sức được cho hành trình thiện nguyện. Khi nào các đoàn còn đi cứu trợ thì nhà hàng còn miễn phí ăn uống", anh Tuấn...

title: Quan chức tình báo Ukraine: Nga muốn giành chiến thắng vào đầu năm 2026
content: Phát biểu tại hội nghị Chiến lược châu Âu Yalta, ông Budanov cho biết: "Cuối năm 2025, đầu năm 2026 là thời điểm quan trọng đối với Nga . Vì vậy, họ muốn chấm dứt cuộc xung đột vào thời điểm đó. Bởi vì theo tính toán của họ, trừ khi họ rời khỏi cuộc xung đột với chiến thắng, thì về lâu dài - trong vòng 30 năm tới - Nga sẽ mất đi vị thế siêu cường mà họ mong muốn". Theo ông Budanov, Nga dự đoán "mọi vấn đề của họ sẽ bắt đầu vào mùa hè năm 2025". Khi đó, các vấn đề về tài chính, kinh tế và chính trị - xã hội sẽ xuất hiện. "Nga dự đoán tác động tiêu cực đến nền kinh tế của họ sẽ trở nên đáng chú ý vào khoảng mùa hè năm 2025", ông Budanov nói. Quan chức này cũng cho biết, vấn đề tuyển quân đang ngày càng trở nên cấp bách với quân đội Nga. "Họ sẽ phải đối mặt với tình thế khó xử trong giai đoạn hè 2025: Hoặc là tuyên bố huy động lực lượng, hoặc bằng cách nào đó giảm cường độ giao tranh", ông Budanov nói. Người đứng đầu cơ quan tình báo cho biết thêm, rằng tâm trạng của người dân Nga cũng bị ảnh hưởng bởi những nỗ lực của Ukraine nhằm đưa cuộc xung đột vào sâu trong lãnh thổ Nga. Theo ông Budanov, nếu Nga không giành chiến thắng thì đến cuối năm 2025, thế giới sẽ chỉ còn...

title: חזר בסערה: ליאו מסי כבש צמד נהדר, בישל - ודאג אישית למעריץ
creator: מערכת ספורט היום

title: בשל איומים באלימות בפסטיבל הקולנוע בטורונטו: לא יתקיימו הקרנות סרט הדוקו על מלחמת רוסיה אוקראינה
creator: ענבל חייט
content: פסטיבל הסרטים הבינלאומי של טורונטו ביטל באופן זמני את כל ההקרנות של סרט תיעודי חדש העוסק במלחמה בין רוסיה לאוקראינה, תוך ציון "איומים משמעותיים" על בטיחות הציבור כסיבה לדחיית הקרנת הסרט. מפגינים מחוץ לפסטיבל טורונטו נגד הקרנת סרט הדוקו על המלחמה בין אוקראינה ורוסיה, צילום: AP לאחר שהודיעו ביום רביעי שהפסטיבל ימשיך להקרין את סרטה של הבמאית אנסטסיה טרופימובה, "רוסים במלחמה" ("Russians at war"), למרות הפגנות רבות מחוץ למתחמי הפסטיבל, בחמישי האחרון מארגני הפסטיבל חזרו בהם ועדכנו בהודעה חדשה כי נכון לעכשיו ההקרנות המתוכננות לא תתקיימנה. "נכון לעכשיו, הפסטיבל נאלץ לעצור את ההקרנות הצפויות של 'רוסים במלחמה' ביום שישי, שבת וראשון, לאחר שהתקבלו איומים משמעותיים על תפעול הפסטיבל ובטיחות הציבור. בעוד אנו עומדים מאחורי ההצהרה שפרסמנו אתמול, ההחלטה התקבלה במטרה להבטיח את בטיחות כל אורחי הפסטיבל, הצוות והמתנדבים", נכתב בהצהרה שתיארה את ההחלטה כ"מהלך חסר תקדים" עבור הפסטיבל. מפגינים מחוץ לפסטיבל טורונטו נגד הקרנת סרט הדוקו על המלחמה בין אוקראינה ורוסיה, צילום: AP "כמוסד תרבותי, אנו תומכים בשיח אזרחי דרך סרטים, כולל חילוקי דעות, ואנו תומכים לחלוטין באספות שקטות", נמשכה ההצהרה. "עם זאת, קיבלנו דיווחים על פעילות פוטנציאלית בימים הקרובים שמציבה סיכון משמעותי; לאור חומרת הדאגות הללו, איננו יכולים להמשיך כמתוכנן. זו הייתה החלטה קשה מאוד. בבחירת סרטים, אנו מונחים על ידי החזון של הפסטיבל, הערכים שלנו ועקרונות התכנים שלנו. אנו מאמינים שהסרט הזה ראוי למקום ברשימת הפסטיבל שלנו ואנו מחויבים להקרינו כאשר זה יהיה בטוח לעשות זאת". בתיאור הרשמי של הפסטיבל על הסרט "רוסים במלחמה" מצוין שהפרויקט "מתעמק מעבר...

title: Microsoft 365 Roadmap Weekly: Teams for Android is getting some new features soon
content: Welcome back to the Microsoft 365 Roadmap Weekly feature. Every Sunday, we check out the to see the most interesting new entries that have been added in the past seven days. This week, there are a bunch of new entries specifically for upcoming features for the Microsoft Teams app for Android devices. For example, : Admins can switch the screens of Teams Rooms on Android devices in dual display mode remotely, correcting front-of-room display issues without physical support. The screen swap control is accessible in device settings and the Teams admin center. Also due in November for the Teams Android app; Dual display rooms are now capable of presenting up to 18 videos (3x3 on each screen) when no content is being shared during meetings. This enhancement ensures a uniform experience across both Windows and Android Teams Rooms devices. In December, there will be a : Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents. Also in December, the : IT admins will be able to manage and add contacts to Teams phone devices deployed in shared spaces through the Teams admin center. This ensures users across the organization can easily call important contacts, such as emergency numbers or help desks. In other Microsoft 365 Roadmap updates, the new Outlook app for Windows and...

title: Evo koje su posljedice puštanja vode s dignutom WC daskom
creator: 24sata
content: Stručnjak iz tvrtke Badeloft Bathrooms naglasio je da jedno ispiranje može izbaciti tisuće mikrokapljica u zrak. Upozorio je da je još rizičnije u bolnicama. POGLEDAJTE VIDEO: Pokretanje videa... - Ispiranje s podignutim poklopcem omogućuje štetnim česticama da se prenesu zrakom i talože na površinama u cijeloj kupaonici. To je posebno zabrinjavajuće u bolnicama, gdje širenje infekcija može imati teške posljedice - rekao je Steven Parker. Još jedna stručnjakinja iz tvrtke Badeloft Bathrooms, Lisa Jones, rasvijetlila je dodatne kupaonske pogreške koje nesvjesno ugrožavaju naše zdravlje. Posebno je upozorila na naizgled bezopasnu naviku korištenja istog ručnika više puta nakon tuširanja ili kupanja. Vlažni ručnici mogu postati "savršeno tlo za razmnožavanje bakterija i plijesni". - Ručnik može sakupiti više bakterija nego WC školjka! Svakako promijenite ručnik svaka dva do tri dana i temeljito ga osušite nakon svake upotrebe - kaže Jones. Savjetovala je i da svoju kozmetiku ili pribor za šminkanje ne držite u kupaonici jer se zbog vlage mogu brzo pokvariti i apsorbirati štetne bakterije. Ovo, kada se nanese na lice, može rezultirati infekcijama kože i prištićima.

title: Bỏ lương cơ sở, lương cán bộ, lực lượng vũ trang ra sao?
content: Công ty Luật TNHH Youme cho hay, theo Kết luận 83-KL/TW năm 2024, Bộ Chính trị đã kết luận việc triển khai thực hiện cải cách tiền lương theo Nghị quyết 27-NQ/TW năm 2018 đối với cán bộ, công chức, viên chức và lực lượng vũ trang có nhiều khó khăn, vướng mắc, bất cập. Bộ Chính trị đã có yêu cầu đối với Ban Kinh tế Trung ương chủ trì sơ kết việc thực hiện Nghị quyết 27-NQ/TW năm 2018, đề xuất việc thực hiện 5 bảng lương và 9 chế độ phụ cấp mới của khu vực công cho phù hợp để trình Trung ương xem xét sau năm 2026 khi Bộ Chính trị ban hành và triển khai thực hiện hệ thống Danh mục vị trí việc làm trong hệ thống chính trị (Căn cứ tại tiểu mục 5.2 Mục 5 Kết luận 83-KL/TW năm 2024). Theo Kế hoạch thực hiện Kết luận 83-KL/TW năm 2024 và Nghị quyết 142/2024/QH15 về cải cách tiền lương, điều chỉnh lương hưu, trợ cấp bảo hiểm xã hội, trợ cấp ưu đãi người có công và trợ cấp xã hội do Thủ tướng Chính phủ ban hành kèm theo Quyết định 918/QĐ-TTg năm 2024, Bộ Nội vụ phối hợp với Ban Kinh tế Trung ương, các bộ, cơ quan liên quan nghiên cứu đánh giá, sơ kết Nghị quyết 27-NQ/TW năm 2018 cho phù hợp với thực tiễn để trình Trung ương xem xét, quyết định, thời gian hoàn thành trong năm 2026. Theo...

title: Чи можна не йти на похорон і як пережити смерть близького: священник вказав на нюанси
content: Не всі знають, чи можна не йти на похорон близької людини, і чи не є неприсутність на похороні гріхом, а також, як впоратися з втратою того, хто дорогий. Священник Православної церкви України, активіст, ректор Відкритого Православного Університету Святої Софії-Премудрості Георгій Коваленко пояснив кореспондентові УНІАН важливі нюанси щодо траурного заходу. За словами експерта, відвідування похорону залежить від обставин, і "це точно не вимірюється категоріями - гріх не гріх". Священник наголосив, що похорон - прощання з людиною, її тілом, остання можливість бути поруч, і це такий момент вшанування померлого. Коваленко зазначив, що колись на жалобному заході можна було побачити чиєсь обличчя востаннє, а зараз є достатня кількість фотографій, відео, аудіо, які залишаються нам на пам'ять. Співрозмовник додав, що відвідування похорону - це прояв любові до померлого, а також можливість підтримати рідних і близьких. "...хтось ходить на похорон, хтось - ні. Церква не вимагає обов'язкової присутності на похороні", - сказав співрозмовник. Експерт додав, що кожен може сам вирішувати, як йому вшанувати пам'ять померлого - віддавати шану публічно чи молитися вдома. "...не кожна людина нормально почувається на цвинтарі чи на похороні, тому обов'язкове відвідування не вимагається", - пояснив священник. За словами Коваленка, якщо хтось не може вшанувати пам'ять померлого чи загиблого особистою присутністю, то може у той момент, коли відбуватиметься похорон, помолитися -...

title: التحدي المقبل لـ الهلال بعد الفوز على الرياض
content: هاي كورة – حقق نادي الهلال فوزًا مهمًا على نظيره فريق الرياض، بثلاثة أهداف مقابل لا شيء، في اللقاء الذي جمع بينهما ضمن منافسات بطولة الدوري السعودي للمحترفين. الهلال يستعد لمواجهة نظيره فريق الريان القطري، يوم الثلاثاء المقبل، ضمن منافسات بطولة كأس النخبة الآسيوية.

title: મેરઠમાં 3 માળની ઈમારત ધરાશાયી થતા 10 લોકોના મોત, નબળા પિલરની 4 ઈંચની દીવાલમાં પાણી ભરાવાથી ઘટી દુર્ઘટના
creator: Mina Pandya
content: ઉત્તર પ્રદેશના મેરઠમાં ત્રણ માળની ઈમારત ધરાશાયી થવા અને 10 લોકોના મોત પાછળનું મુખ્ય કારણ સામે આવ્યું છે. 300 ચોરસ યાર્ડ જમીનમાં બનેલી આ ઈમારતમાં માત્ર એક જ પિલર હતો અને તે પણ ગેટ પાસે હતો. આખી ઇમારત માત્ર ચાર ઇંચની દિવાલ પર ઊભી હતી. મોટી વાત એ છે કે દિવાલ આટલી નબળી હોવા છતાં તેની ઉપર વધુ એક માળ બનાવવાની તૈયારી ચાલી રહી હતી. કારણ કે મેરઠમાં સતત વરસાદ પડી રહ્યો હતો. જેના કારણે ઘરના પાયામાં પાણી ભરાઈ ગયા હતા. આનાથી નબળી પડી ગયેલી દિવાલો તૂટી પડી હતી. શનિવારે સાંજે થયેલા આ અકસ્માતમાં રવિવારે સવાર સુધીમાં 10 લોકોના મૃતદેહ બહાર કાઢવામાં આવ્યા હતા, જ્યારે એક-બે લોકો હજુ પણ કાટમાળ નીચે ફસાયેલા છે. તેમને બચાવવા માટે રેસ્ક્યુ ઓપરેશન હાથ ધરવામાં આવી રહ્યું છે. પોલીસના જણાવ્યા અનુસાર આ ઘરનો ગ્રાઉન્ડ ફ્લોર લગભગ 50 વર્ષ પહેલા બનાવવામાં આવ્યો હતો. જો કે, બાદમાં મકાનમાલિક અલાઉદ્દીને આ ફ્લોર પર ડેરી ફાર્મ ખોલ્યું અને તેના રહેવા માટે ઉપરનો માળ બનાવ્યો. અલાઉદ્દીનના મૃત્યુ પછી તેના ચાર પુત્રો સાજીદ, નદીમ, નઈમ અને શાકીરે ડેરી ચલાવવાનું શરૂ કર્યું. ફ્લોર ફક્ત નબળા પાયા પર બાંધવામાં આવ્યા હતા ઉપર રહેવાની જગ્યા ઓછી હતી. તેથી વધુ એક માળ બાંધવામાં આવ્યો. શરૂઆતમાં આ ઘર ડેરી અનુસાર પિલર વગર બાંધવામાં આવ્યું હતું. દિવાલો પણ માત્ર અડધી ઈંટની બનેલી હતી. આવી સ્થિતિમાં જેમ જેમ ઉપરનો માળ બાંધવામાં આવ્યો તેમ તેમ દિવાલો અને પાયો નબળો પડી ગયો. આ લોકો તેમની દિવાલ પાસેની ડેરીમાંથી છાણ અને અન્ય કચરો ભેગો કરી રહ્યા હતા. અહીં ઘણા દિવસોથી સતત વરસાદ પડી રહ્યો હોવાથી આ કચરામાં વરસાદી પાણી જમા થવા લાગ્યું અને ઘરના પાયામાં ઘૂસી ગયું. જેના કારણે પાયાથી લઈને દિવાલો સુધી પાણી ભરાયુ હતુ. ડેરીના કારણે અકસ્માત આ ભીનાશને કારણે...

title: Росіяни масово здають ЗСУ кадировців, техніку і склади у Курській області, - ЦНС
content: Все частіше російські військові та цивільні йдуть на співпрацю зі Збройними силами України. Так, мешканці Курської області масово повідомляють про кадировців, бо тільки так можуть захиститися від них, склади боєприпасів та переміщення техніки. "Так само майже за кожним результативним ударом вглиб тимчасово окупованих територій стоять люди, які надають інформацію про позиції ППО, склади боєприпасів або переміщення російських підрозділів", - розповіли у Центрі національного спротиву. У ЦНС нагадали, як наприкінці серпня на Курському напрямку підрозділи Сил оборони збили дуже рідкісний розвідувально-ударний БПЛА "Оріон"- "такий собі російський "Байрактар" на мінімалках". Усього РФ виробила 30 таких дронів, з яких вже щонайменше 7 - збито. Їхня вартість не невідома, але інвестиції в цей проєкт склали близько $30 млн. Виробництвом цих БПЛА займається російське акціонерне товариство "Кронштадт", розташована в місті Санкт-Петербург. Крім "Оріона" воно випускає ще кілька інших безпілотників та систем для них. За даними ЦНС, у знищенні цього дрона допоміг інформатор всередині групи, яка займається обслуговуванням та пілотуванням цих дронів, і пов’язаний із "Кронштадтом". Ця особа вийшла на контакт із представниками певних підрозділів ЗСУ і запропонувала передати інформацію щодо БПЛА, системи управління, підготовки персоналу, а головне – як саме загарбники застосовують "Оріони" проти наших військ. Отримавши повну інформацію Повітряні сили влаштували засідку...

title: Prince William and Princess Kate's parenting rules - and the boundaries for kids
creator: newsdesk@nottinghampost.com (Emma Mackenzie, Zena Hawley)
content: Even being a member of the Royal Family doesn't exempt you from occasionally irritating your children with rules they wish didn't exist. Prince William and Princess Kate are not shy about setting boundaries for their three children, Prince George, Princess Charlotte, and Prince Louis. However, these rules aren't always well-received by the young royals, according to a report. Kate has committed herself to promoting the importance of early years development, both as a mother and through her Royal duties. This involves spending quality time with her children and encouraging them to engage in active, healthy hobbies. However, this commitment sometimes makes her unpopular with her children. GoodtoKnow reports that there is one rule that Kate refuses to budge on, much to the chagrin of her three children. The issue reportedly arose when Prince William and Kate were set to represent the monarchy at the Royal Variety Show, a glamorous event featuring world-class entertainers, reports the Mirror . Get the latest news straight to your phone by joining us on WhatsApp Back in 2023, the couple made an appearance at a glamorous event, where their three children pleaded to join in on the festivities. However, Kate put her foot down for a significant reason: "Not on a school night." The Duchess of Cambridge's approach to parenting is notably stringent and echoes that of many parents across the UK, focusing on enforcing rules which are not always well-received by the youngsters. In terms of...

title: „Aduceți macetele, toată lumea pe graniță" » Cum a provocat o partidă de fotbal din 1969 un război în America Centrală
creator: redactia@gsp.ro (Cezar Titor)
content: GSP SPECIAL » SPECIAL » POVESTE POLITICĂ ȘI SPORT „Aduceți macetele, toată lumea pe graniță" » Cum a provocat o partidă de fotbal din 1969 un război în America Centrală Startul incidentelor din tribună Share pe Facebook Share pe Whatsapp LiveScore Google news Ultima oră 0 Comentarii Articol de Cezar Titor - Publicat duminica, 15 septembrie 2024, 08:58 / Actualizat duminica, 15 septembrie 2024 08:58 Sportul și politica au o relație ciudată, complicată și inevitabilă. Gazeta Sporturilor vă propune un serial săptămânal în care analizează felul în care cele două mari agregatoare de pasiuni s-au intersectat. La bine, la rău. Astăzi, un caz neverosimil, despre ura mocnită dintre două țări din America de Sud și scânteia care a declanșat un război frontal: un meci de fotbal! Să spui că politica nu face parte din sport nu este realistic. Când alerg, sunt mai mult decât un alergător. Sunt un diplombat, un ambasador pentru țara mea. - Filbert Bayi Sanka, alergător tanzanian Sportul are puterea de a schimba lumea. Poate uni lumea într-un mod în care orice altceva nu reușește. Vorbește într-o limbă pe care tinerii o înțeleg. Sportul poate crea speranță acolo unde exista doar deznădejde. Este mai puternic decât guvernele în ceea ce privește dărâmarea barierelor rasiale. Râde în fața tuturor tipurilor de discriminare. Eroii pe care sportul îi creează sunt exemple ale acestei puteri. Sunt viteji, nu doar pe terenul de joc, dar...

title: Babies born to women consuming high fat, sugary diet risk heart disease, diabetes as adults—Scientists
creator: Tribune Online
content: Babies born to pregnant women with obesity are more likely to develop heart problems and diabetes as adults due to foetal damage caused by the high-fat, high-energy diet of their mother. That’s the finding from a new study, published in the Journal of Physiology on September 13, that shows for the first time that maternal obesity alters a critical thyroid hormone in the foetal heart, disrupting its development. Consuming a high-fat, sugary diet during pregnancy also increases the likelihood of the unborn baby becoming insulin-resistant in adulthood, potentially triggering diabetes and causing cardiovascular disease. This is despite babies being a normal weight at birth. University of South Australia researchers identified the link by analysing tissue samples from the foetuses of pregnant baboons fed a high-fat, high-energy diet in a biomedical research institute in the United States. They then compared this to foetuses from baboons on a control diet. Lead author, University of South Australia PhD candidate, Melanie Bertossa, says the findings are significant because they demonstrate a clear link between an unhealthy diet high in saturated fats and sugar, and poor cardiovascular health. “There has been a long-standing debate as to whether high-fat diets induce a hyper- or hypothyroid state in the foetal heart. Our evidence points to the latter,” Bertossa says. “We found that a maternal high-fat, high-energy diet reduced concentrations of the active thyroid hormone T3, which...

title: Rupert Murdoch’s youngest daughters linked to succession battle
creator: Christopher Williams, James Warrington
content: As Rupert Murdoch prepares to do battle with three of his own children in a Nevada courtroom this week on behalf of his eldest son, Lachlan, two more of the media mogul’s offspring will remain on the sidelines. But inside his empire, speculation is mounting over the role his young daughters Grace, 22, and Chloe, 21, could play in the climax of his succession drama. Rupert Murdoch with his daughters Chloe (second from left) and Grace, and their mother, Wendi, in New York in 2019. Credit: Getty Images Murdoch has applied to amend the terms of an “irrevocable” trust that hands his four children from his first two marriages an equal say in the control of his businesses after his death. The 93-year-old aims to put the future of News Corp and Fox entirely in the hands of Lachlan, 53, whose robust right-wing politics closely match his own. Meanwhile, Prudence, 66, Elizabeth, 56 and James, 51, have more moderate instincts and the numbers on the trust to push influential outlets such as Fox News in a new direction after their father departs. The dispute has gripped the media industry and will this week frustrate it, as an attempt by news organisations to gain access to the private hearings was rebuffed by the court on Friday. The irony of a tabloid buccaneer such as Murdoch seeking secrecy in a family matter has been widely noted. Grace and Chloe, the children of Murdoch and his former wife Wendi Deng, whose marriage ended in 2013, share equal financial status to their half siblings...

title: Над Рязанской областью сбит беспилотник
content: Над территорией Рязанской области средствами противовоздушной обороны в 7:30 был сбит украинский беспилотник, сообщило Минобороны. По информации губернатора региона Павла Малкова, никто не пострадал. «Силами ПВО Минобороны над территорией Рязанской области уничтожен БПЛА. Пострадавших и материального ущерба нет»,— написал Павел Малков в своем Telegram -канале. В ночь на 15 сентября атаке российских беспилотников подверглись семь российских регионов. По информации Минобороны, большинство из них уничтожено над Брянской областью — 15. Еще пять сбито над Курской областью, четыре — над Смоленской, два — над Орловской и по одному — над Белгородской, Калужской, и Ростовской областями. Пострадавших, по словам местных властей, нет. 13 сентября премьер-министр Великобритании Кир Стармер прибыл в США для проведения переговоров с американским президентом Джо Байденом по урегулированию конфликта на Украине. По его словам, стороны не планируют обсуждать вопрос о разрешении Украине бить вглубь России западными дальнобойными ракетами Storm Shadow На фото: Кир Стармер (справа) и министр иностранных дел Великобритании Дэвид Лэмми в резиденции британского посла в Вашингтоне Фото: Stefan Rousseau / Pool Photo / AP Командир спецназа «Ахмат» генерал-майор Апты Алаудинов заявил, что российские военные начали наступление в Кореневском районе Курской области. По его словам, 10 сентября, военнослужащие освободили 10 сел. Их названия он не привел На фото: работа расчета САУ 2С3...

title: No. 1 Georgia escapes Kentucky's upset bid with 13-12 win
creator: Field Level Media
content: Trevor Etienne ran for a team-high 79 yards on 19 carries, helping No. 1 Georgia eke out a 13-12 win over Kentucky on Saturday in Lexington, Ky. Georgia (3-0, 1-0 SEC) won its 42nd straight regular-season game as Carson Beck completed 15 of 24 passes for 160 yards, while Dominic Lovett caught six passes for 89 yards in the Bulldogs' SEC opener. Former Georgia quarterback Brock Vandagriff was 14 of 27 for 114 yards, while Demie Sumo-Karngbaye ran for a game-high 98 yards as Kentucky (1-2, 0-2) dropped its second straight game and its 15th consecutive game to Georgia. Alex Raynor was 4-for-4 on field-goal attempts, accounting for all of Kentucky's scoring. Holding a 6-3 halftime lead, Kentucky put together an 11-play, 61-yard drive that was capped with Raynor's third field goal, extending the Wildcats' lead to 9-3 at the 9:03 mark of the third quarter. On the ensuing Georgia drive, Beck found Lovett for a 33-yard pass and Dillon Bell on a 20-yard pickup, setting the offense up on the Kentucky 32-yard line. Georgia got as far as the Wildcats' 12, where Woodring hit his second field goal, a 30-yarder to trim the deficit to 9-6 with 3:52 left in the third. After a Kentucky punt, Etienne accounted for 51 of Georgia's 68 yards on the next drive, setting up Branson Robinson's 3-yard rushing score, giving Georgia a 13-9 lead with 12:20 remaining in the game. Kentucky answered with Raynor's fourth field goal, a 51-yarder to cut the Georgia lead to 13-12 at the 8:01 mark. After forcing...

title: ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್​ಟಿಆರ್-ಪುನೀತ್ ಗೆಳೆತನ ಎಂಥದ್ದು? ಇಲ್ಲಿದೆ ವಿವರ
creator: TV9 Web Team
content: ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್​ಟಿಆರ್ ಹಾಗೂ ಪುನೀತ್ ರಾಜ್ಕುಮಾರ್ ನಡುವೆ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯ ಬಾಂಧವ್ಯ ಇತ್ತು. ಪುನೀತ್ ನಿಧನ ಹೊಂದಿದಾಗ ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್​ಟಿಆರ್ ಅವರು ಬೆಂಗಳೂರಿಗೆ ಓಡೋಡಿ ಬಂದಿದ್ದರು. ಪುನೀತ್ ಶವದ ಪಕ್ಕ ನಿಂತು ಕಣ್ಣೀರು ಹಾಕಿದ್ದರು. ಕುಟುಂಬದವರಿಗೂ ಅವರು ಬಲ ತುಂಬಿದ್ದರು. ಸಮಯ ಸಿಕ್ಕಾಗ ಈಗಲೂ ಪುನೀತ್ ಅವರನ್ನು ನೆನಪಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಪುನೀತ್ಗಾಗಿ ಒಂದು ಹಾಡನ್ನು ಕೂಡ ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್ಟಿಆರ್ ಹಾಡಿದ್ದರು. ‘ಚಕ್ರವ್ಯೂಹ’ ಸಿನಿಮಾ 2016ರಲ್ಲಿ ರಿಲೀಸ್ ಆಯಿತು. ಈ ಚಿತ್ರಕ್ಕೆ ಪುನೀತ್ ಹೀರೋ. ಈ ಸಿನಿಮಾದಲ್ಲಿ ‘ಗೆಳೆಯ..ಗೆಳೆಯ..’ ಹೆಸರಿನ ಹಾಡು ಬರುತ್ತದೆ. ಇದನ್ನು ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್ಟಿಆರ್ ಅವರು ಹಾಡಿದ್ದರು. ಈ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಅವರು ಕೋರಿದಾಗ ಮರುಮಾತಿಲ್ಲದೆ ಒಪ್ಪಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದರು. ಈ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಪುನೀತ್ ರಾಜ್ಕುಮಾರ್ ಅವರು ಹೇಳಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದರು. ‘ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್ಟಿಆರ್ ನನ್ನ ತಮ್ಮನ ತರ. ನಮ್ಮ ನಿರ್ಮಾಪಕರು ಹೋಗಿ ಬೇರೆಯವರಿಂದ ಈ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಎನ್ಟಿಆರ್ಗೆ ಅಪ್ರೋಚ್ ಮಾಡಿದರು. ಅಪ್ಪು ನನ್ನ ಬ್ರದರ್ ತರ, ಹಾಡ್ತೀನಿ ಎಂದು ಹೈದರಾಬಾದ್ಗೆ ಕರೆದು ಊಟೋಪಚಾರ ಮಾಡಿದರು. ಅವರ ತಾಯಿ ಕುಂದಾಪುರದವರು. ಅವರು ಅಡುಗೆ ಮಾಡಿದರು. ಅವರು ಏನೇ ಕೇಳಿದರೂ ಇಲ್ಲ ಎಂದಿಲ್ಲ. ನಾನು ಎಂದಿಗೂ ಚಿರರುಣಿ’ ಎಂದಿದ್ದರು ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್​ಟಿಆರ್. ಇದನ್ನೂ ಓದಿ: ಜೂನಿಯರ್ ಎನ್​ಟಿಆರ್ ಅವರು ಕನ್ನಡನ ಅದ್ಭುತವಾಗಿ ಮಾತನಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ‘ಆರ್ಆರ್ಆರ್’ ಚಿತ್ರದ ಕನ್ನಡ ವರ್ಷನ್ಗೆ ಅವರೇ ಡಬ್ ಮಾಡಿದರು. ಅವರು ಕರ್ನಾಟಕದ ವೇದಿಕೆ ಮೇಲೆ ಬಂದಾಗ ಕನ್ನಡದಲ್ಲೇ ಮಾತನಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ. ಈ ಕಾರಣಕ್ಕೆ ಅವರು ಅನೇಕರಿಗೆ ಇಷ್ಟ ಆಗುತ್ತಾರೆ. ‘ದೇವರ’ ಚಿತ್ರ ಸೆಪ್ಟೆಂಬರ್ 27ರಂದು ವಿಶ್ವಾದ್ಯಂತ ರಿಲೀಸ್ ಆಗುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಈ ಚಿತ್ರಕ್ಕೆ ಕೊರಟಾಲ ಶಿವ ನಿರ್ದೇಶನ ಇದೆ. ಈ ಚಿತ್ರದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಫ್ಯಾನ್ಸ್ ನಿರೀಕ್ಷೆ ಇಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇತ್ತೀಚೆಗೆ ಅವರು ತಾಯಿಯ ಕುಂದಾಪುರಕ್ಕೆ ಬಂದಿದ್ದರು. ಈ ವೇಳೆ ನಿರ್ದೇಶಕ, ನಟ ರಿಷಬ್ ಶೆಟ್ಟಿ ಜೊತೆ ಎಲ್ಲ ಕಡೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಸುತ್ತಾಡಿದ್ದರು. ಉಡುಪಿ ಕೃಷ್ಣ ಮಠಕ್ಕೂ ಭೇಟಿ ನೀಡಿ ಬಂದಿದ್ದರು. ಸಿನಿಮಾ ಸುದ್ದಿಗಳಿಗಾಗಿ ಇಲ್ಲಿ

title: “Voy a seguir siendo el mejor peleador aunque no les guste”: Saúl ‘Canelo’ Álvarez
creator: Irving Chávez
content: Deportes comentarios “Voy a seguir siendo el mejor peleador aunque no les guste”: Saúl ‘Canelo’ Álvarez Edgar Berlanga agradeció la oportunidad al mexicano después de la pelea El mexicano Saúl "Canelo" Álvarez derriba al boricua Édgar Berlanga, en una pelea por el título de los supermedianos, el sábado 14 de septiembre de 2024 en Las Vegas (AP Foto/John Locher) AP (John Locher/AP) Por Irving Chávez 14 de septiembre 2024 a las 23:57 hrs. El esperado combate entre Saúl Álvarez y Edgar Berlanga finalmente se concretó en la T-Mobile Arena de Las Vegas y ante la mirada de todos los aficionados, Canelo salió de forma contundente con el brazo en alto reteniendo la corona que lo acredita como el monarca indiscutible de la división de los Supermedianos. Sobre eso, el pugilista nacional decidió ofrecer unas palabras posterior a su combate, donde señalo lo difícil de la pelea ante el puertorriqueño y mandó un mensaje para sus detractores, asegurando que sigue siendo el mejor de la división y uno de los mejores del mundo. “Me siento bien y muy contento, hice una gran pelea . Antes decían que enfrentaba más grandes que yo porque era lo que había y ahora quiero ver que van a decir. Al final hice un gran trabajo y vamos a seguir siendo los mejores peleadores, aunque no les guste ”, aseguró el campeón de las 168 libras. Referente a la actuación de su rival, Álvarez expuso sus respetos por la preparación y el desempeño que mostró, además de asegurar que...

title: 제주 한림공고 '항공 우주 인재' 양성 본격 나선다
creator: 양영전 기자
content: [제주=뉴시스] 양영전 기자 = 제주도교육청은 항공 우주 분야 협약형 특성화고등학교로 지정된 한림공업고등학교가 제주형 자율학교로 지정된 데 이어 학과 재구조화도 마침에 따라 특성화고 육성 사업을 본격적으로 추진한다고 15일 밝혔다. 협약형 특성화고는 지역과 국가에 필요한 특수 산업이나 지역 기반 산업의 인재를 육성하기 위해 지자체·기업·특성화고 등이 협약을 통해 맞춤형 교육을 시행하는 특성화고 육성 정책이다. 한림공고는 항공 우주 분야 지역인재 양성 등을 주요 내용으로 교육부 협약형 특성화고 공모에 최종 선정됐다. 5년간 교육부 특별교부금 45억원, 도 30억원, 도교육청 60억원 등 예산이 투입된다. 도교육청은 2025년 신입생 대상 학과 재구조화를 시행했으며, 제주형 자율학교 지정이 이뤄짐에 따라 내년에 개방형 학교장을 공모하고 본격적인 운영에 들어간다는 방침이다. 도교육청 관계자는 "민간 우주 항공 및 시설 산업 분야에서 요구하는 맞춤식 전문 직업 능력을 함양할 수 있도록 행정·재정적으로 지원할 방침"이라고 말했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: Galatasaray kural hatası mı yaptı? Sahadakilerin yarısı değişince... Serdar Ali Çelikler'den "Kitapta yazmıyor" iddiası
content: Galatasaray - Çaykur Rizespor maçında kural hatası yapıldığı iddiası, özellikle sosyal medyada geniş yankı buldu. Galatasaray'ın seyircisi önünde 5-0 kazandığı maçta iki takımında 5 yerine 6 değişiklik yapması tartışma yarattı. Bazı futbolseverler bu durumun kural hatası olduğunu iddia ederken, spor yorumcusu Serdar Ali Çelikler'in açıklamaları da dikkat çekti.

title: На территории Рязанской области силы ПВО сбили беспилотник
content: Рязанская область подверглась атаке БПЛА. Об этом сообщил губернатор Павел Малков в своём Telegram-канале. По его словам, беспилотник был уничтожен силами ПВО в воскресенье, 15 сентября. «Пострадавших и материального ущерба нет», - сообщил губернатор Рязанской области Павел Малков.

title: Venezuela. EUA rejeitam acusações de "conspiração" para derrubar Maduro
creator: Lusa
content: W ashington negou imediatamente "qualquer envolvimento" dos Estados Unidos "numa conspiração para derrubar" o Presidente da Venezuela, Nicolás Maduro. Em conferência de imprensa, no sábado, o ministro do Interior venezuelano, Diosdado Cabello, falou de um alegado plano para "gerar violência e desestabilizar" o país. As autoridades venezuelanas anunciaram também a apreensão de cerca de 400 espingardas provenientes dos EUA. Cabello afirmou que Maduro, cuja reeleição nas presidenciais de 28 de julho está a ser contestada pela oposição e por parte da comunidade internacional, era o alvo deste alegado plano, juntamente com outros funcionários do executivo. "Dois cidadãos espanhóis foram recentemente detidos em Puerto Ayacucho (sul)", disse o ministro, acrescentando que um "cidadão norte-americano" também estava sob custódia, bem como outros dois norte-americanos e um checo. Cabello associou o alegado plano aos serviços secretos espanhóis e norte-americanos, bem como à líder da oposição Maria Corina Machado. "Contactaram mercenários franceses, contactaram mercenários da Europa de Leste e estão a levar a cabo uma operação para tentar atacar o nosso país", disse Cabello, acrescentando que os detidos estavam em vias de confessar. As mais de 400 espingardas apreendidas destinavam-se "a atos terroristas aqui na Venezuela, terrorismo incentivado por setores políticos", disse, assegurando: "Sabemos até que o governo dos EUA está ligado a esta...

title: Sobe para 74 número de mortos nas inundações em Myanmar
creator: Lusa
content: A s inundações causaram 74 mortos e 89 desaparecidos, de acordo com um relatório elaborado pelas autoridades na sexta-feira à noite, citado pelo jornal Global New Light of Myanmar. O balanço anterior era de 33 mortos e mais de 235 mil deslocados. De acordo com os dados oficiais, as inundações e os aluimentos de terras mataram cerca de 350 pessoas em Myanmar (antiga Birmânia), Vietname, Laos e Tailândia, na sequência do Yagi, que atingiu a região no fim de semana passado. As operações de busca e salvamento prosseguem em Myanmar, adiantou o jornal, acrescentando que as inundações destruíram mais de 65 mil casas e cinco barragens. No centro do país, nomeadamente nos arredores da capital, Naypyidaw, foram inundadas extensas áreas agrícolas e registaram-se aluimentos de terras nas regiões montanhosas. Com as estradas e pontes danificadas e as linhas telefónicas e de Internet cortadas, é difícil recolher informações sobre a situação. O chefe da junta militar no poder, general Min Aung Hlaing, pediu, no sábado, ajuda internacional para responder à situação. No passado, o Governo bloqueou ajuda humanitária estrangeira. As inundações agravaram a situação no país, palco de uma guerra civil desde que a junta tomou o poder em 2021. A violência obrigou mais de 2,7 milhões de pessoas a abandonar as suas casas. Leia Também: Myanmar pede ajuda a países estrangeiros depois de inundações no país

title: Exército da Nigéria resgata 13 reféns de grupo extremista
creator: Lusa
content: "A s tropas conseguiram dominar os terroristas, forçando-os a abandonar os prisioneiros", afirmou o exército, num comunicado citado pela Associated Press (AP). Vários raptores foram mortos e outros capturados, acrescentou o exército, sem especificar a que grupo armado pertenciam. Os reféns resgatados foram levados para uma instalação militar para uma avaliação médica antes de se reunirem com as famílias. Durante a operação de resgate, foram também encontradas armas, munições, painéis solares e dinheiro, indicou na mesma nota. Os raptos tornaram-se comuns em algumas zonas do norte da Nigéria, onde dezenas de grupos armados tiram partido da reduzida presença de segurança para efetuar ataques em aldeias e ao longo das principais estradas. A maioria das vítimas só é libertada após o pagamento de resgates, que, por vezes, atingem os milhares de dólares. Pelo menos 1.400 estudantes foram retiradas das escolas nigerianas desde que o rapto de 276 raparigas em 2014 por militantes do grupo extremista islâmico Boko Haram na aldeia de Chibok, no estado de Borno, chocou o mundo. O Boko Haram lançou a sua insurreição em 2009 para estabelecer a lei islâmica 'sharia' no país. As agências da ONU na Nigéria indicaram que pelo menos 35.000 pessoas foram mortas e 2,1 milhões foram deslocadas em resultado da violência extremista. Leia Também: Pelo menos 52 mortos na Nigéria após explosão de camião-cisterna

title: Oposição na Venezuela convoca "mobilização global" para dia 28
creator: Lusa
content: O Conselho Nacional Eleitoral (CNE) no entanto proclamou a vitória de Nicolás Maduro. Através das redes sociais, o movimento explicou que a manifestação visa pedir o reconhecimento mundial de González Urrutia - exilado desde 08 de setembro em Espanha - como "Presidente eleito", rejeitar Nicolás Maduro e exigir o fim dos "crimes contra a humanidade". "A nossa voz não conhece fronteiras e a nossa vontade de mudança chegará a todos os cantos do planeta. Levantaremos as nossas vozes para exigir o reconhecimento de Edmundo González como Presidente eleito, rejeitar Maduro (...) e não mais crimes contra a humanidade", publicou na rede social X a equipa de campanha do ex-candidato presidencial. A líder da oposição María Corina Machado, principal apoiante de González Urrutia, também partilhou o apelo para o dia 28 de setembro, quando, segundo ela, os venezuelanos vão "fazer o mundo inteiro vibrar". "Todos unidos pela mesma causa: a liberdade da Venezuela. Dois meses depois da nossa espetacular vitória, levantaremos a nossa voz", disse a ex-deputada, que partilhou um vídeo que mostra várias personalidades do país caribenho, como o cantor Carlos Baute e os atores Édgar Ramírez e Omar Rudberg, com breves frases sobre a "mudança política" que - insistem - foi decidida a 28 de julho. Entre as mensagens, afirmam que, nas eleições presidenciais, a Venezuela "mostrou a sua vontade de mudança" e escolheu "a dignidade em vez da submissão" e "a democracia em vez...

title: Mpox. Testes de despistagem continuam a ser reduzidos na RDCongo
creator: Lusa
content: "A cobertura de testes na RDCongo continua a ser baixa, devido à capacidade limitada de testes", afirmou a agência de saúde da ONU no último relatório sobre a situação divulgado no sábado. "Devido ao acesso limitado a testes laboratoriais em áreas remotas, apenas cerca de 40% dos casos suspeitos foram testados em 2024 (em comparação com 9% em 2023) e, destes, cerca de 55% tiveram resultados positivos", acrescentou a OMS. Os três países que notificaram o maior número de casos suspeitos no ano até 08 de setembro foram a RDCongo, com mais de 21.000 casos e 700 mortes, seguida do Burundi (1.489 casos suspeitos, sem mortes) e da Nigéria (935 casos suspeitos, sem mortes). Em 14 de agosto, a OMS declarou uma emergência internacional para o mpox. Em termos de disponibilidade mundial de vacinas, a OMS afirmou que tinham sido prometidas mais de 3,6 milhões de doses, incluindo mais de 620.000 doses de vacina MVA-BN provenientes de países europeus, dos Estados Unidos e do fabricante Bavarian Nordic. O Japão comprometeu-se a fornecer três milhões de doses da vacina LC16. Até à data, foram entregues 265.000 doses da vacina MVA-BN à RDCongo e 10.000 à Nigéria. África registou 26.543 casos de mpox (5.731 confirmados) e 724 mortes pela doença, antes conhecida como varíola do macaco, desde o início do ano, informou o Centro Africano de Controlo e Prevenção de Doenças (CDC Africa) na quinta-feira. O mpox pertence à mesma família de vírus que a varíola, mas...

title: Míssil disparado pelo Iémen cai no centro de Israel
creator: Lusa
content: "U m míssil terra-terra foi identificado quando atravessava o centro de Israel, depois a zona leste, tendo caído numa zona afastada", indicou, em comunicado. O exército acrescentou não ter "registado qualquer ferido". Numa nota posterior, pouco antes das 07:00 (05:00 em Lisboa), as forças armadas israelitas referiram que o "míssil tinha sido disparado a partir do Iémen". "As explosões ouvidas nos últimos minutos provêm do sistema de interceção [dos mísseis]. O resultado da interceção está a ser examinado", adiantou. Os rebeldes huthis, que controlam várias zonas do Iémen, lançaram vários ataques contra Israel, afirmando atuar em solidariedade com os palestinianos na Faixa de Gaza, no âmbito da guerra entre Israel e o movimento islamita palestiniano Hamas. Esta guerra foi desencadeada por um ataque do Hamas em solo israelita a 07 de outubro do ano passado. Em julho, os huthis realizaram um ataque com 'drone' contra Telavive, tendo morto um civil israelita. Na resposta, o exército israelita bombardeou o porto iemenita de Hodeida, controlado pelos huthis, a 20 de julho. O chefe dos rebeldes huthis considerou, no início do mês passado, "ser inevitável" ripostar ao ataque israelita. Há vários meses que os rebeldes huthis têm também como alvo navios, que consideram ligados a Israel, Estados Unidos ou Reino Unido, no golfo de Adem e no mar Vermelho. Estes ataques perturbam o trânsito nesta zona marítima essencial para o comércio mundial, o que levou...

title: Filipa Patão quer "colocar Benfica no mapa" do futebol feminino europeu
creator: Lusa
content: "C olocar o Benfica no mapa é conseguir a consistência e eu penso que isso ainda não foi conseguido, no sentido em que ainda falta olharem para o Benfica como um eterno clube que vai passar da fase de grupos", admitiu a treinadora, em entrevista à agência Lusa. Apesar de terem estado sempre presentes na fase de grupos da 'Champions', desde que o atual modelo foi implementado, as 'encarnadas' conseguiram ultrapassá-la apenas "uma vez", precisamente na última época. "Queremos, principalmente, a consistência europeia e essa consistência é: permanentemente nas fases de grupos e passando as fases de grupos. A partir daí, qualquer clube luta para chegar à final e tem esse propósito, mas temos de conseguir essa consistência para o Benfica, para o projeto e também para o futebol feminino, por arrasto", apontou a treinadora, no Benfica Futebol Campus, no Seixal. Se ultrapassarem as suecas do Hammarby, na segunda ronda de qualificação para a fase de grupos, as 'encarnadas' juntam-se a FC Barcelona, Lyon, Bayern Munique e Chelsea no lote de equipas que conseguiram o 'pleno' da fase de grupos, às quais podem juntar-se, também, o Paris Saint-Germain e o Real Madrid, adversário do Sporting nesta eliminatória. Filipa Patão lembra, no entanto, que "são poucas as equipas que passam consecutivamente a fase de grupos". "E eu acho que é para aí que o Benfica tem de caminhar. Passo a passo e com aquela consistência que eu digo que é olharem para nós e dizerem: sim...

title: Ucrânia. G7 condena exportação de mísseis iranianos para a Rússia
creator: Lusa
content: "N ós, os ministros dos Negócios Estrangeiros do G7 [Canadá, França, Alemanha, Itália, Japão, Reino Unido e Estados Unidos] e o Alto Representante da União Europeia condenamos com a maior veemência possível a exportação do Irão e a aquisição pela Rússia de mísseis balísticos iranianos", de acordo com uma carta divulgada no sábado. Os signatários alertaram que o desprezo das autoridades iranianas neste contexto "representa uma nova escalada do apoio militar iraniano à guerra de agressão da Rússia contra a Ucrânia", afirmando que "a Rússia utilizou armamento iraniano (...) para matar civis ucranianos e atacar as infraestruturas críticas". O grupo dos sete países mais industrializados do mundo reiterou que "a agressão da Rússia constitui uma violação flagrante do direito internacional" e instou o Irão a "cessar imediatamente todo o apoio à guerra ilegal e injustificável da Rússia contra a Ucrânia e a interromper essas transferências de mísseis balísticos, veículos aéreos não tripulados e tecnologia conexa, que constituem uma ameaça direta ao povo ucraniano, bem como à segurança europeia e internacional em geral". Os ministros comprometeram-se a "responsabilizar Teerão" e a responder "com novas medidas significativas". A declaração conjunta surgiu depois de a Alta Representante da ONU para os Assuntos de Desarmamento, Izumi Nakamitsu, ter manifestado na sexta-feira "profunda preocupação" com a contínua transferência de armas e...

title: Messi 'parte a louça toda' no regresso ao Inter Miami após lesão
creator: Lusa
content: E m encontro do campeonato norte-americano (MLS), a formação forasteira marcou logo no primeiro minuto, pelo dinamarquês Mikael Uhre, mas Messi deu a volta ao jogo ainda na primeira parte, com tentos aos 26 e 30. O argentino marcou o primeiro de pé direito, depois de uma assistência do uruguaio Luis Suárez, e o segundo de pé esquerdo, após um passe -- mais um - do espanhol Jordi Alba. Na segunda parte, o conjunto comandado pelo técnico 'albi-celeste' Tata Martino só sentenciou o encontro na parte final dos descontos, aos 90+8 minutos, com Suárez a somar o 17.o tento na prova, em 21 jogos, após assistência de Messi. O argentino, que não jogava desde a final da Copa América, em 15 de julho, quando se lesionou no tornozelo, e na MLS desde 01 de junho, conta 14 golos e 10 assistências, em apenas 14 jogos na fase regular do campeonato norte-americano. O Inter Miami lidera destacado a Conferência Este da MLS, com 62 pontos (28 jogos), mais 10 do que Cincinnati e já está qualificado para os play-offs. Na frente da Conferência Oeste, seguem os Los Angeles Galaxy, com 52 (28).

title: Sobe para 24 número de mortos em explosão de camião-cisterna no Haiti
creator: Lusa
content: A o fim da tarde de sábado (hora local), as autoridades encontraram outros corpos carbonizados perto do local da explosão, disse o chefe da proteção civil do Haiti, Emmanuel Pierre. A explosão ocorreu quando as vítimas tentavam recolher combustível do camião-cisterna acidentado no distrito de Miragoâne (sudoeste), disseram testemunhas, de acordo com a agência de notícias France-Presse. Cerca de 40 pessoas ficaram feridas, metade das quais com muita gravidade, indicou. Miragoâne é uma cidade portuária situada a cerca de 100 quilómetros de Porto Príncipe, a capital deste pobre país das Caraíbas, parcialmente controlado por grupos armados. O primeiro-ministro interino, Garry Conille, convocou uma reunião de emergência após a tragédia, disse Pierre. Em dezembro de 2021, a explosão de um camião-cisterna no norte do país causou pelo menos 90 mortos e quase 50 feridos graves. Leia Também: Pelo menos 16 mortos no Haiti em explosão de camião-cisterna

title: Associações de imigrantes preparam manifestação para pressionar políticos
creator: Lusa
content: "E stamos apreensivos em relação ao resultado final disto tudo. (...) Se todos nós não estivermos disponíveis para pressionar, para lutar com toda a nossa força, com os meios que temos ao nosso alcance, para conquistar este direito que nos foi retirado", o poder político "não vai ceder", afirmou à Lusa Timóteo Macedo, no dia em que 57 associações de imigrantes se reúnem para discutir medidas de luta. Em junho, o Governo alterou a lei de estrangeiros e, entre outras medidas, extinguiu a figura das manifestações de interesse, um recurso jurídico que permitia a legalização de imigrantes em Portugal que tivessem chegado ao país com visto de turista. Este recurso era o mais utilizado nos processos de regularização e o principal motivo dos atrasos no sistema, que conta com 400 mil casos pendentes. A medida gerou vários protestos junto das associações do setor e, desde então as principais estruturas reuniram-se com o Presidente e vários grupos parlamentares para sensibilizar o poder político para o problema. Hoje, "nós vamos essencialmente prestar contas também daquilo que fizemos e queremos muito organizar a ação da rua que vamos preparar para o mês de outubro, se tudo correr bem até lá", afirmou Timóteo Macedo, que lamentou a falta de compromisso dos principais partidos em alterar a lei. "Nós estamos muito apreensivos em relação às audiências que tivemos, nomeadamente com o grupo parlamentar do PS", que não se comprometeu em repor a...

title: Francisco Trincão 'explode' e Sporting já pensa na renovação
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: F rancisco Trincão está a assinar um arranque de temporada 'diabólico', com três golos e uma assistência ao cabo dos seis primeiros jogos com a camisola do Sporting, os últimos dos quais na passada sexta-feira, no categórico triunfo sobre o Arouca, por 0-3. De acordo com a edição deste domingo do jornal A Bola, a direção liderada por Frederico Varandas pretende recompensar o internacional português pela preponderância adquirida nos planos de Rúben Amorim, e já estará mesmo a estudar a possibilidade de renovar o atual contrato. O vínculo, assinado há pouco mais de um ano, aquando da aquisição do passe ao Barcelona, a troco de sete milhões de euros, mantém-se válido até junho de 2027, mas a intenção passa por prolongá-lo por, pelo menos, mais uma temporada. O bom momento de forma, recorde-se, levou, inclusive, o selecionador nacional, Roberto Martínez, a convocá-lo para a dupla jornada da fase de grupos da Liga das Nações, mas acabou por não sair do banco de suplentes, diante de Croácia e Escócia. Leia Também: Notas do Arouca-Sporting: Sob 'efeito ketchup', leões não vão em cantigas

title: FC Porto-Farense: Esquecer Alvalade e retomar o caminho das vitórias
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: O FC Porto recebe, este domingo, o Farense em jogo da 5.a jornada da I Liga. Após a derrota na visita ao rival Sporting, em Alvalade, e já depois de uma pausa para os compromissos das seleções, os comandados de Vítor Bruno tentam retomar o caminho das vitórias em casa perante um Farense em total queda. O conjunto algarvio não soma qualquer ponto ao cabo das quatro primeiras jornadas e precisa, por isso, urgentemente de pontuar, até porque já é dono e senhor do último lugar da tabela classificativa. Ainda assim, Vítor Bruno garantiu não esperar qualquer tipo de facilidades por parte da equipa orientada por José Mota e pede foco máximo aos jogadores. Nuno Almeida é o árbitro nomeado para ajuizar a partida no Estádio do Dragão, agendada para as 15h30, e terá como assistentes Hugo Ribeiro e Luís Viegas, sendo Fá Sanha o quarto árbitro. O VAR será Bruno Costa, assistido por Jorge Fernandes. Poderá acompanhar, mais logo, no Desporto ao Minuto, todas as incidências da partida entre FC Porto e Farense. Treinadores em discurso direto Vítor Bruno Jogo às 15h30: "O horário do jogo parece-me muito apelativo. Recordo-me dos meus tempos de infância e de acompanhar a Académica, indo pela mão de quem me levava. O estádio estava cheio... Aqui é um contexto diferente. Acho que o futebol deve ser um meio unificador e catalisador de um sentimento familiar forte. A vitória tem obrigatoriamente de acontecer". Reagir à derrota de Alvalade: "Após uma derrota, a...

title: Perth FIFO worker’s personal defibrillator helps passenger during medical emergency on Qantas flight
creator: Claire Sadler
content: A Perth FIFO worker was about to settle in for his flight to work when he came to the rescue of a fellow passenger who suddenly collapsed on the plane. A Qantas flight from Perth to Newman was just minutes from taking off on Monday morning when a passenger began to suffer from severe chest pain radiating down his left arm — symptoms commonly associated with cardiac distress. Among flight QF1702, which was filled mostly with FIFO workers, was Philip Taulelei who has advanced medical training from his military service. The FIFO worker quickly jumped into action with his personal defibrillator when the man in his 40s suddenly collapsed in the middle of the aisle. A paramedic on board called for a defibrillator, which Mr Taulelei said he always packs in his carry on luggage. “The man collapsed in the aisle and suddenly became less responsive,” Mr Taulelei said. “The paramedic in charge asked for a DFIB. They had one on the aircraft but that was a couple of minutes away but with mine we had it on his chest within seconds.” Mr Taulelei’s portable defibrillator called CellAED remained on the man’s chest for over 12 minutes as it monitored his heart rhythm and prepared to administer a shock if needed. Fortunately no shocks were required before an ambulance arrived and took the man to Royal Perth Hospital. The flight, which was meant to take off at 6.15am on Monday, eventually departed three hours later. “If he deteriorated he was in the best place because we had all the right gear...

title: Notas do Benfica-Santa Clara: Lage vive 'déjà vu' à boleia de mago turco
creator: Rodrigo Querido
content: F oi numa noite com tiques de 'déjà vu' que o Benfica voltou a sorrir no campeonato. O clube da Luz recebeu e goleou, no sábado, o Santa Clara por 4-1, com reviravolta, num jogo da quinta jornada que marcou o regresso de Bruno Lage ao banco da formação encarnada. E o leitor agora pergunta: 'Déjà vu, porquê?' A resposta é simples. Se puxarmos o filme atrás, há mais de cinco anos Bruno Lage estreou-se pela equipa principal do Benfica. Na altura, o setubalense viu a sua equipa entrar a perder por 2-0 frente ao Rio Ave, mas os encarnados acabaram a golear com João Félix e Seferovic a bisarem. Quase a papel químico, e já em 2024, o técnico de 48 anos entrou no jogo a perder, mas acabou por conquistar os três pontos. Na noite de ontem Lage não conseguiu caçar com João Félix e Seferovic, mas, escudado na magia da dupla turca e na mudança do sistema tático, o treinador do Benfica conseguiu mesmo a reestreia vitoriosa. Os açorianos colocaram-se em vantagem no marcador logo aos 23 segundos, por Vinicius Lopes que castigou um erro do capitão de equipa Otamendi. Embora surpreendido com a entrada de rompante dos açorianos, o Benfica reagiu bem e chegou ao empate um pouco antes da meia hora de jogo. Akturkoglu mostrou credenciais no jogo de estreia e finalizou com classe após um passe certeiro do compatriota Kokçu. O trabalho da dupla turca retirou alguma pressão aos encarnados, que chegaram com naturalidade ao 2-1, que fez a reviravolta no marcador. Na...

title: Morreu a estilista norte-americana Mary McFadden aos 85 anos
creator: Lusa
content: M cFadden tornou-se um ícone da moda nova-iorquina não só pelas criações, mas também pelo estilo pessoal: sempre com o rosto coberto de maquilhagem branca e o cabelo cortado curto. Na Mary McFadden Inc, empresa que dirigiu de 1976 a 2002, desenhou vestidos plissados, que, afirmava a estilista, caíam "como ouro líquido" pelo corpo da mulher, fazendo lembrar o estilo dos anos 1920. O mais peculiar destes modelos era o material, pois eram feitos de um tecido sintético que vinha da Austrália e era depois tingido no Japão. Patenteou este tecido em 1975 e chamou-lhe Marii. Nos desenhos, McFadden pegou em símbolos de diferentes culturas que conheceu em muitas viagens. "As suas roupas não reflectiam apenas estilos e interesses próprios, mas eram uma extensão da forma como existia no mundo", referiu a Vogue sobre McFadden, que morreu na sexta-feira na residência em Long Island (Nova Iorque). Foi a primeira mulher presidente do Council of Fashion Designers of America, cargo que ocupou de 1982 a 1983. McFadden, que se casou várias vezes, era uma mulher apaixonada pela arte. Aos 16 anos, a avó ofereceu-lhe três pulseiras de diamantes. Poucos anos mais tarde, em 1958, conheceu Salvador Dalí num cocktail em Nova Iorque e fez um acordo com ele: os diamantes em troca de algumas das obras do pintor, noticiou no sábado o jornal The New York Times. Em 2009, os desenhos de McFadden foram expostos no National Museum of Women in the Arts, em Washington, bem como nas galerias...

title: یک هوادار فریاد کشید او را کُشتید، او مُرد!/ آمبولانس دوم کجا بود و دکتر ورزشگاه کجا رفت؟/ یک ایست قلبی ناراحت‌کننده و باقی ماجرا...

title: SUBHADRA Yojana: Rs 1 each credited to bank accounts of beneficiaries for verification
creator: Cassian Baliarsingh
content: The Odisha government on Sunday transferred Rs 1 each to all the applicants who have applied for the ambitious Subhadra Yojana. The amount was done for verification purposes and the authenticity of the bank accounts as a ‘test transaction’. All the women applicants, who have applied on or before September 15, will get their first instalment of Rs 5000 each on September 17, on the birthday of PM Narendra Modi. However, Odisha Deputy CM Pravati Parida assured that the registration and form fill-up process will continue until the last beneficiary is added to the Subhadra list. “All the applicants who will apply after September 17 will also get the money. There is no need to panic. The scheme will continue till the last beneficiary gets the amount credited to her bank account,” the Deputy CM said. She also advised all the applicants not to worry and apply as soon as possible. Till now, around 60L women have managed to apply and the CM Mohan Majhi-led BJP government aims to include at least 1 crore women under the Subhadra yojana. “We don’t want the Subhadra money to be waylaid. So, for full proof we have sent Rs 1 each to the bank accounts of the beneficiaries,” the Deputy CM said. “As a woman, I am confident that women will not misuse the money. This will be the foundation stone for strengthening and empowering women in Odisha. This is PM Modi’s dream of a women-led development,” she added.

سعر الدينار الكويتي اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024
